bookTitle: Cassidy Jones and the Secret Formula
Plot: This is an alternate cover image. (ISBN 10: 0615377130 (ISBN13: 9780615377131) One Girl. One Accident. One Incredible Superhero. Cassidy Jones is your typical fourteen-year-old— that is, until a seemingly harmless accident in the laboratory of a world-renowned geneticist turns her world upside down. Discovering incredible strength, speed, and enhanced physical senses that defy logic, Cassidy embarks on an action-packed adventure that has her fighting for answers…and for her very life.
Characters: Cassidy Jones, Emery Phillips, Jared Wells
